claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.

combined_evidence.quote: b RIV4: Flublok. c SD-IIV4: Afluria, Fluarix, FluLaval, Standard Dose Flu zone and FlucelVax.
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly identifies RIV4 as Flublok and SD-IIV4 as standard-dose influenza vaccines, establishing the products being compared in the claim.

combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote confirms that RIV4 refers to Flublok, which is necessary to directly connect the product name to the vaccine type discussed in the claim.
